activities: Personal data is collected from customers in-store and online. We collect customer information in our stores and through our websites connected to this policy in an effort to improve the customer shopping experience and to communicate with customers about our products, services, contests and promotions.
corpofftitle1: EVP, Global Responsibility, General Counsel, Chief Compliance Officer and Corporate Secretary

personaldata: Customer data.  Data does not include manually processed data.
